abstract: Bank of America announced the names of the senior business heads for its corporate, commercial and investment banking operations on Thursday in an internal memo, obtained by Reuters. The changes go into effect after the company completes its acquisition of Merrill Lynch, which goes to a vote among shareholders at both companies on Dec. 5.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America announced the names of the senior business heads for its corporate, commercial and investment banking operations on Thursday in an internal memo, obtained by Reuters. The changes go into effect after the company completes its acquisition of Merrill Lynch, which goes to a vote among shareholders at both companies on Dec. 5.

headline.main: BofA Names Top Banking Business Heads
